report.title: Species and occurrence counts by designations
report.description: List species and record counts grouped by designations for a results set.
report.query: select #columns# from taxon_designations td join taxa_taxon_designations ttd on ttd.taxon_designation_id=td.id and ttd.deleted=false join taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.taxon_id=ttd.taxon_id and ttl.deleted=false join taxa_taxon_lists ttl2 on ttl2.taxon_meaning_id=ttl.taxon_meaning_id and ttl2.deleted=false join occurrences o on o.taxa_taxon_list_id=ttl.id and o.deleted=false join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false where td.deleted=false and td.category_id=216 AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (o.zero_abundance='f' OR o.id IS NULL) AND (CAST(su.id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND o.record_status<>'R'

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
